title: Blinky Bill (Captioned)
creator_credit: Yoram Gross Films and Yoram Gross
brief_description: Blinky Bill the koala sets off to try and find his mother after their peaceful bush home is destroyed by loggers. He meets new friends and has many adventures along the way in this delightful animated film which is based on Dorothy Wall’s classic story.
